column27: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#390074#390074#TD4035E.TXT.r_14674# de de la brten nas des 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa des / /
column28: 0.026#TD4091E.TXT.r#1317350#1317351#TD4091E.TXT.r_6573;TD4091E.TXT.r_6574# zhes bshad pa las de dag kyang phra rgyas kyi dbang gis bsags par 'gyur gyi phra rgyas med bar ni srid pa mngon par mi 'grub pa'i phyir / / +srid pa'i  rtsa ba phra rgyas yin par rig par bya'o // /
column29: 0.026#TD4087E.TXT.r#2828778#2828778#TD4087E.TXT.r_489# de las de dang yang dag  par blangs pa de lta bu dang  yang dag par bzung ba de lta bus lus zhig nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar ro // /
column30: 0.027#TD4091E.TXT.r#1331736#1331737#TD4091E.TXT.r_7873# ji ltar na de dag mthong bar 'gyur ba brjod par bya ste / /
column31: 0.027#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1955960#1955960#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4069;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4070# 'phags pa srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa ni zag pa med pa'i ci yang med pa'i skye mched mngon sum du byas nas zag pa zad par 'gyur ro // / +ji ltar na der skyes pa de mngon sum du byed ce na //// /
column32: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#57788#57788#TD4036E.TXT.r_4831# 'di ltar lhag pa'i tshul khrims la gnas na sems rtse  gcig pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro // /
column33: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1864461#1864461#TD4054E.TXT.r_5951;TD4054E.TXT.r_5952# de ni 'di ltar sdug par shes pa'i phyir dang  gnas dang dmigs pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam par shes pa skad cig re re la gzhan du 'gyur bar rtogs pa'i phyir ro // / +kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par  byang ba'i chos tsam du zad de / /
column34: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#47842#47842#TD4036E.TXT.r_3980# des pa gas pa dang  sha dang  khrag dang  chu rgyus kyi zungs dang bral ba'i dur khrod gang dag ma thong na zhes gang gsungs pa des ni rnam par dmar pa bstan to // /
column35: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#327945#327945#TD4035E.TXT.r_9004;TD4035E.TXT.r_9005# gcig nas rtog pa dang  tshig gong ma dang sbyor ba dang  tshig 'og ma dang sbyor ba dang  mu bzhir sbyor ba dang  dngos po med pa dang  gzugs can gyi chos rnams dang   gzugs can ma yin pa rnams dang  bstan du yod pa rnams dang  bstan du med pa rnams dang  thogs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  thogs pa med pa rnams dang  zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  zag pa med pa rnams dang  'dus byas rnams dang   'dus ma byas rnams dang  nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  nyon mongs pa med pa rnams dang  zang zing dang bcas pa rnams dang  zang zing med pa rnams dang  zhen pa la brten pa rnams dang  mngon bar 'byung ba la brten pa rnams dang  'jig rten  pa rnams dang  'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang  khongs su gtogs pa rnams dang  khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa rnams dang  nang gi rnams dang  phyi rol gyi rnams dang  rags pa rnams dang  phra ba rnams dang  ngan pa rnams dang  bzang po  rnams dang  rgyang ring ba rnams dang  nye ba rnams dang  dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  dmigs pa med pa rnams dang  mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang  mi ldan pa rnams dang  rnam pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  rnam pa med pa rnams dang  rten dang bcas  pa rnams dang  rten med pa rnams dang  rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa dang  'bras bu dang 'bras bu ma yin pa dang  rnam par smin pa dang  rnam par smin pa ma yin pa rnams dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba rnams dang  rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba ma yin pa rnams dang  'bras     // / +bu dang bcas pa rnams dang  'bras bu dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams dang  rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa rnams dang  zin pa rnams dang  ma zin pa rnams dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur  byas pa dang  'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa ma yin pa dang  mtshungs pa rnams dang  de dang mtshungs pa rnams dang  gong na yod pa rnams dang  gong na med pa rnams dang  'das pa rnams dang  ma 'ongs pa rnams dang  da ltar byung ba rnams dang  dge ba rnams dang  mi dge ba rnams dang   lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang  'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  slob pa rnams dang  mi slob pa rnams dang  slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa rnams dang  mthong bas spang  bar bya ba rnams dang  bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang  spang bar bya ba ma yin pa rnams dang  rkyen bzhi ste / /
column36: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#43412#43413#TD4036E.TXT.r_3581# nga rgyal gyi kun nas dkris pa de  yang yun ring du rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ba dang  de khengs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur zhing / /
column37: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#1317044#1317044#TD4091E.TXT.r_6545;TD4091E.TXT.r_6546# snyan  dngags grangs te go rims bzhin // / +sbyor bas rab tu bcug ba zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi bye brag gis rab tu bcug pa'o // /
column38: 0.029#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2705600#2705600#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10903# rgyu la ltos kyang 'bras bu yin pa dang  ji ltar gang la ltos nas pha yin pa de la ltos nas bu ma yin la / /
column39: 0.029#TD4042E.TXT.r#3058043#3058043#TD4042E.TXT.r_759;TD4042E.TXT.r_760# dman pa la phan yon smos pas gdul ba rnams gya nom pa la yang phan yon 'dzin du bcug par 'gyur pa dang  phan yon bcu po dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir dang  dge 'dun legs par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la  sogs pa gsal bar yongs su bstan pa phan yon de dag la 'jug par bslab pa'i phyir ro // / +gang gi tshe rnam par grol ba ni thams cad pas bla na med pa'i chos yin no / /
column40: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#1358877#1358877#TD4091E.TXT.r_10361# sprul pa'i sems la skyang bsam gtan dag pa dang sprul pa'i sems skye ste / /
column41: 0.029#TD4061E.TXT.r#2749348#2749348#TD4061E.TXT.r_576;TD4061E.TXT.r_577# bcom ldan 'das zla ba phyed dang gsum nang du yang dag par 'jog par mdzad pa ni nyan thos rnams skom par bya ba'i phyir te / / +'dir / /

column3: de la rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la reg pa ni sa dang po thob pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#33579#33590#TD4036E.TXT.r_2675;TD4036E.TXT.r_2676# ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshog dang  yi ge'i tshogs mthun pa dag gi sa ci rigs par rim gyis bkod cing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#33652#33660#TD4036E.TXT.r_2680;TD4036E.TXT.r_2681# gang las nyan thos shi 'phos pa dang  dus byas pa dang  skye ba lung ston pa dang  nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang yin pa de ni lung bstan pa'i sde zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#33692#33696#TD4036E.TXT.r_2686;TD4036E.TXT.r_2687;TD4036E.TXT.r_2683;TD4036E.TXT.r_2684;TD4036E.TXT.r_2685# rtsa ba lnga pa'am / / +rtsa ba drug par rtsa ba bsdebs te bshad pa gang yin pa de ni tshigs su bcad pa'i sde zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4083E.TXT.r#1245971#1245972#TD4083E.TXT.r_1148# na ste mi nus pa dang gzhan la sngar khas blangs zin pa dang  rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa dang  yid rtul po zhig ste mi mkhas pa yin pa dang  thabs des 'dul bar 'dod pa dang  dge 'dun gyi nang  khrims srung bar 'dod pa dang  gzhan mang po dag gis sems srung bar 'dod pa dang ma bcol ba dang  bcol bar gyur kyang gzhan zhig la yang bcol ba dang  gnod pa dang ldan pa'am / /
column8: 0.007#TD4064E.TXT.r#765114#765114#TD4064E.TXT.r_558# de'i 'og tu bsgom ba khyad zhugs par gyur pas de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thag ring du gyur ba'i phyir dgos pa med de / /
column9: 0.008#TD4061E.TXT.r#2758955#2758955#TD4061E.TXT.r_1383;TD4061E.TXT.r_1384# sems ni 'jug par byed pas na // / +grol byed rab tu shes par bya // /
column10: 0.010#TD4027E.TXT.r#1007637#1007637#TD4027E.TXT.r_1384# brgal ba dang  lan ni lhag ma rnams so zhes bya ba de la brgal  ba ni 'di yin te / /
column11: 0.010#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1788491#1788491#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12211# de ni yid la byed pa rnam pa bcu gcig yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa mos pa spyod pa'i sa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir sems gnas pa dgu yid la bya ste / /
column12: 0.010#TD4054E.TXT.r#1881554#1881554#TD4054E.TXT.r_7383# zhes bya ba ni rtag pa dang  bde ba dang  gtsang ba dang  bdag las bzlog ste mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i phyir phyin ci log la shin tu gnas pa yongs su mi nyams  pa'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.010#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2973668#2973668#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7067# nyi ma'i 'gros kyi bye brag las 'di na nyin mo dang mtshan mo rnams ring thung  du 'gyur te / /
column14: 0.011#TD4003E.TXT.r#776138#776139#TD4003E.TXT.r_186;TD4003E.TXT.r_187# sangs rgyas mtshan ni ye shes te // / +lta ba'i nyes pa rnam spangs pa // /
column15: 0.011#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2910989#2910991#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1934;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_1935# gang dag gis ris mthun par gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni tshe'i 'du byed dag yin la / / +gang dag gis dus gzhan gyi  bar du 'tsho ba de dag ni srog gi 'du byed dag yin no // /
column16: 0.012#TD4068E.TXT.r#1032808#1032809#TD4068E.TXT.r_330# log par 'dzin pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang rnam par rig byed ni gzugs ma yin gyi gzugs zhes bya ba ni gzhan zhig  yod do snyam du sems pa'o // /
column17: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#2467586#2467586#TD4037E.TXT.r_6416# de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o // /
column18: 0.012#TD4095E.TXT.r#148503#148503#TD4095E.TXT.r_3424;TD4095E.TXT.r_3425# lus kyi 'byung ba chen po da ltar byung ba rnams ni rten du 'gyur te / / +'khor lo sa la 'dril ba lag pas 'phul ba dang  sa'i phyogs bzhin no // /
column19: 0.012#TD4047E.TXT.r#2217691#2217693#TD4047E.TXT.r_14442;TD4047E.TXT.r_14443# 'bras bu rab kyi mthar gyur pa ni gang yang smras pa / / +byang chub mchog gi 'bras bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // /
column20: 0.012#TD4027E.TXT.r#1003151#1003153#TD4027E.TXT.r_921;TD4027E.TXT.r_922# brjed dang bying dang rgod pa dang / / +'du mi byed dang 'du byed de // /
column21: 0.012#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#396805#396806#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_22;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_23# 'dir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba de brtags na skyon rnam gsum yod de / / +dang po ni rgya gar gyi  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa'i dpe nyid la de ltar rnam par phye ba med pas so // /
column22: 0.012#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2708366#2708366#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11082# au ta gong na yod pa'i ba da ni 'byung ba'i don te zhes bya ba ni skad  kyi dbyings bsgyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column23: 0.013#TD4069E.TXT.r#1206726#1206726#TD4069E.TXT.r_6879# dge slong dag 'di na dge slong gi mdun du gang zag chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug la / /
column24: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#33671#33675#TD4036E.TXT.r_2682;TD4036E.TXT.r_2683;TD4036E.TXT.r_2684# rkyang bas bshad pa ma yin pa ste / / +'di ltar rtsa pa gnyis pa'am / /
column25: 0.013#TD4091E.TXT.r#1331301#1331302#TD4091E.TXT.r_7832# gang gi tshe tshor ba'i phyogs gcig sdug  bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin pa de'i tshe ji ltar na 'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal zhes brjod ce na / /
column26: 0.013#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1521596#1521596#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11523# de lta na 'o na rnam par rig byed dpe ma yin te / /
column27: 0.014#TD4069E.TXT.r#1216254#1216254#TD4069E.TXT.r_7587;TD4069E.TXT.r_7588# ngan song ba'i skye ba dang  las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa gnyis bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir yang bar du de smos pa yin te / / +de la bdag la gnod par byed pa ni skye     // /
column28: 0.014#TD4061E.TXT.r#2802020#2802021#TD4061E.TXT.r_4581# chung dus mang po yang dag par 'joms pa'i khyad par gyis ni 'di ltar spong ba'i lam skad cig ma gcig gis thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam pa mang po yang dag par 'joms pas so // /
column29: 0.014#TD4095E.TXT.r#167382#167382#TD4095E.TXT.r_5253# dngos po gang la 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i 'dod chags dang  khong khro dang  nga rgyal rnams skyes pa ma spangs pa de dag gis dngos po de dang ldan te / /
column30: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#25834#25834#TD4036E.TXT.r_2090;TD4036E.TXT.r_2091# des kun nas nyon mongs pa skyes pa de nyid legs pa kho nar rab tu shes shing / / +da dung mi len pa stong par byed / /
column31: 0.014#TD4091E.TXT.r#1331456#1331456#TD4091E.TXT.r_7849# tshor ba gsum dang rim bzhin te // /

column33: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1815986#1815987#TD4054E.TXT.r_1552;TD4054E.TXT.r_1553# shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par sun  'byin pa'i shes pa nas / /
column34: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#12334#12334#TD4036E.TXT.r_880;TD4036E.TXT.r_881# 'di ltar 'di na la la nyes par gzung ba 'dzin cing gnas ma yin pa 'gyod par byed de // / +de 'gyod par byed pa'i gnas ma yin pa dag la 'gyod bar byed pa na gnas ma yin pa gzhan dag la mnar ba'i sems sam / /
column35: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#2040993#2040997#TD4047E.TXT.r_223;TD4047E.TXT.r_224# nyan thos kyi gtso bo rnams kyang rung / / +rang sangs rgyas kyi bse ru lta bu yang rung / /
column36: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1875088#1875088#TD4054E.TXT.r_6882;TD4054E.TXT.r_6883# sbyin pa'i tshig bzhi po 'di dag ni go rims bzhin du rtsom pa dang  bag chags dang  sku dang  rgyu mthun par yang rig par bya'o // / +de la rtsom pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams te / /
column37: 0.017#TD4095E.TXT.r#167097#167098#TD4095E.TXT.r_5227# 'di ltar bsam gtan pa ni gsum ste / /

column39: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3103902#3103902#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1488# gnas  ma yin zhing go skabs med de gang sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed la shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa mya ngan las 'das par 'jug pa'i gegs kyi phyogs ma spangs shing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sems legs par mi gnas shing mi spyod  la ; /
column40: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#25569#25569#TD4036E.TXT.r_2066# stobs dang  pha rol gnon pa chung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column41: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#167127#167128#TD4095E.TXT.r_5231# lung du ma bstan pa'i dngos po bcu bzhi gang gsungs pa de dag lung du ma bstan pa ni ma yin te / /
column42: 0.024#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1928345#1928346#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1682# de ltar byas na khams gsum char na yang dgra bcom pa drug yod par rung ngo // /
column43: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3099476#3099476#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1173# nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen po kha dog bzang po dang ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes / /
column44: 0.026#TD4061E.TXT.r#2772753#2772753#TD4061E.TXT.r_2425;TD4061E.TXT.r_2426# dge slong dag dge slong gsar bu 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi gnod pas gtses pa / / +tshangs par spyod pa'i 'dam gyis zil gyis non pa / /
column45: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3095500#3095500#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_850# so so'i skye bo'i sa las yang dag par 'das te yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sa non cing rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma thob la / /
column46: 0.028#TD4037E.TXT.r#2389276#2389276#TD4037E.TXT.r_460# de las gnod pa med pa'i bsod nams ni gang dang ldan na byang  chub sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba kun nas bsrung ba'i nyis 'gyur gyis bsrung ba yin te / /
column47: 0.029#TD4064E.TXT.r#765229#765229#TD4064E.TXT.r_568# 'di ni rnam par tho mi 'tshams pa'i las can no // /
column48: 0.029#TD4027E.TXT.r#1000432#1000432#TD4027E.TXT.r_645# kun 'byung ba'i don rnam pa gsum gyis kun 'byung ba'i bden pa ste / /
column49: 0.029#TD4051E.TXT.r#2291267#2291267#TD4051E.TXT.r_4600;TD4051E.TXT.r_4601# de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las gsum po ni ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang  ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa'i las med do // / +de la ye shes kyis kun  nas bslang ba'i phyir ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'o // /
column50: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#2389048#2389048#TD4037E.TXT.r_446# sgrub pa'i sbyor ba ni nyin gcig bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin par byed pa'i sbyor ba dang  lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba nyid la brten nas ci nus ci lcogs kyis sems can rnams la yang phan pa dang  bde bsgrub pa'i sbyor pa'o // /

column9: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#856779#856780#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3055# gzhan yang sdig pa dang bral ba ni ngon zhes bya'o // /

column3: bdag dang gzhan dag gi gzugs zhes bya ba ni gang zag tu sgro 'dogs pa ste / /

column3: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sgo nas gzugs la sogs pa la bdag gir 'dzin pa kun du 'byung  ba'i phyir ro // /

column6: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#33059#33059#TD4036E.TXT.r_2644;TD4036E.TXT.r_2645# nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa dang  dus dus su sdug bsngal lam / / +kun  'byung ba'am / /

column3: gzugs 'di yod do zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#33848#33858#TD4036E.TXT.r_2702# bcom  ldan 'das kyis 'chi 'pho dang skye ba de dang de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang  dka' ba spyad pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#33874#33880#TD4036E.TXT.r_2704;TD4036E.TXT.r_2703# gang las bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang  stobs bcu dang  sgrib  pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir / /
column6: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#288525#288530#TD4035E.TXT.r_5150# tshig  kyal pa las ngag rtsub po kha na ma tho ba ches che ba dang  ngag rtsub po bas phra ma kha na ma tho ba ches che ba dang  phra ma bas brdzun du smra ba kha na ma tho ba ches che ba dang  brdzun du smra ba bas 'dod pa la log par gyem pa kha na ma tho ba ches che ba dang  'dod pa la log par gyem pa bas  ma byin par len pa kha na ma tho ba ches che ba dang  ma byin par len pa bas srog gcod pa kha na ma tho ba ches che ba dang  srog gcod pa bas brnab sems kha na ma tho ba ches che ba dang  brnab sems pas gnod sems kha na ma tho ba ches che ba dang  gnod sems  pas log par lta ba kha na ma tho ba ches che ba dang  sbyin pa las byung ba bas tshul khrims las byung ba ches kha na ma tho ba med pa dang  tshul khrims las byung ba bas bsgoms pa las byung ba ches kha na ma tho ba med pa dang  thos pa las byung ba bas bsams pa las byung  ba ches kha na ma tho ba med pa lta bu'o // /
column7: 0.021#TD4027E.TXT.r#1007938#1007939#TD4027E.TXT.r_1415;TD4027E.TXT.r_1416# mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po'i mtha' // /

column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#33910#33919#TD4036E.TXT.r_2707# gang las sangs rgyas rnams dang  sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang   dge slong ma rnams dang  dge slob ma rnams dang  dge tshul rnams dang  dge tshul ma rnams dang  dge bsnyen rnams dang  dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dang  de las gzhan pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yon tan khyad par can ngo mtshar rmad du byung  bar grags pa dag bstan pa gang yin pa de ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde rnams zhes bya'o // /

column3: rnam par byang ngo zhes bya ba ni lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#33920#33937#TD4036E.TXT.r_2707# gang las sangs rgyas rnams dang  sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang   dge slong ma rnams dang  dge slob ma rnams dang  dge tshul rnams dang  dge tshul ma rnams dang  dge bsnyen rnams dang  dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dang  de las gzhan pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yon tan khyad par can ngo mtshar rmad du byung  bar grags pa dag bstan pa gang yin pa de ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde rnams zhes bya'o // /

column3: da ni gzugs med ces bya ba la sogs pas skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' ston te / /

column3: ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kun     // / +rdzob tu gnas pa de ltar gang zag ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gzugs la btags pa nyid kyis yod ba rnams la skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha'o zhes skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' zhes ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#33956#33969#TD4036E.TXT.r_2707;TD4036E.TXT.r_2708# gang las sangs rgyas rnams dang  sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang   dge slong ma rnams dang  dge slob ma rnams dang  dge tshul rnams dang  dge tshul ma rnams dang  dge bsnyen rnams dang  dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dang  de las gzhan pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yon tan khyad par can ngo mtshar rmad du byung  bar grags pa dag bstan pa gang yin pa de ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde rnams zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#33970#33987#TD4036E.TXT.r_2708;TD4036E.TXT.r_2709;TD4036E.TXT.r_2710# gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde rnams gang zhe na / / +mdo sde dran par byed cing / /

column3: tshig lhag ma lnga po ni bye brag la skur pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34023#34037#TD4036E.TXT.r_2714# de la re zhig mdo'i sde dang  dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang  lung du bstan pa'i sde dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang  ched du brjod pa'i sde dang   rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang  de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang  skyes ba rabs kyi sde dang  shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang  rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde zhes gang gsungs pa de ni mdo sde yin no // /

column3: 'di btags pa'i yod pa la skur na skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' 'gyur ro // /

column3: yod par 'dzin  pa sngon du 'gro ba ni med par 'dzin pa yin pas de ltar rtog na yod par 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur ro // /

column7: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1866409#1866410#TD4054E.TXT.r_6134# dben pa  la gnas pa dang  'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa dang  'gog pa la gnas pa dang  rnam par spang ba yongs su bsgyur ba zhes pa'i tshig bzhi po 'di rnams kyis bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa yongs su bstan te / /

column3: las  ni rang gi 'bras bu 'phen nus pa'o // / +ldan pa ni rang gi 'bras bu la sogs pa dang 'brel ba'o // /

column3: 'jug pa ni rab tu tha dad pa'o // / +gzugs su snang ba rnam par rig pa yang don dam par ma skyes pas de yang gzugs bzhin du brdzun pa'i phyir de bas na gzugs la rnam par rig pa  tsam du mngon par chags pa 'di yang sgro btags pa'i mtha' yin par bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: kun rdzob tu rmi lam la sogs pa bzhin du gzugs snang ba'i rnam par rig pa gnas pa'i phyir ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs  pas kun rdzob tu rnam par rig pa la skur na skur pa 'debs pa'i mthar 'gyur ro zhes ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34160#34167#TD4036E.TXT.r_2728;TD4036E.TXT.r_2729;TD4036E.TXT.r_2730# de ni dam pa'i  chos nyan pa zhes bya'o // / +nyan pa de yang rnam pa gnyis te / /

column7: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34215#34216#TD4036E.TXT.r_2734# bdag la sems pa dang  sems can la  sems pa dang  'jig rten pa la sems pa dang  sems can rnams kyi las kyi RNAM PAR SMIN PA LA sems pa dang  bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul dang  sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sbyangs nas / /
column8: 1.192#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2712920#2712924#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_11379# de yang ci'i phyir ming nyid yin zhe na zhes bya ba ni ming du 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ming de yang rgyu gang gis ming nyid yin zhe na / /
column9: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1881269#1881269#TD4054E.TXT.r_7355# gnyis su med DO ZHES STON TO // /
column10: 0.017#TD4036E.TXT.r#49415#49418#TD4036E.TXT.r_4106;TD4036E.TXT.r_4107# de la nam mkha'i khams gang zhe na / / +mig sbubs yod pa dang  rna ba'i sbubs yod pa dang  sna sbubs yod pa dang  kha sbubs yod pa dang  mgrin pa sbubs yod pa dang  gang gis mid par byed pa dang  gang du mid par byed pa dang  gang    gis mid pa na smad kyi char 'dzag par byed pa dang  gzhan yang gang dag de lta bu dang mthun pa dag ste / /
column11: 0.017#TD4036E.TXT.r#56399#56401#TD4036E.TXT.r_4715;TD4036E.TXT.r_4716# yin par yongs su bstan to // / +de la lhag ma 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang  'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gang yin pa de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis yongs su bstan pa yin te / /
column12: 0.018#TD4036E.TXT.r#17536#17541#TD4036E.TXT.r_1319;TD4036E.TXT.r_1320# de mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs gang dag la mig gtad par bya ba dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid  kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos gang dag la yid gtad par bya ba de dag la yang gtod par byed cing / /
column13: 0.018#TD4009E.TXT.r#589466#589467#TD4009E.TXT.r_382# gang nyes pa 'di lta bu byung ngo zhes gleng zhing 'di ni bya ba ma yin pa zhes nyes pa las 'byin pa'i thabs ston la / /
column14: 0.020#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1578538#1578538#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_16074;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_16075# mo'i yang de dang 'dra'o // / +de nyid kyi phyir / /
column15: 0.020#TD4036E.TXT.r#32211#32211#TD4036E.TXT.r_2560# gshe yang phyir mi gshe ba dang  khros kyang phyir mi khro ba dang     brdegs kyang phyir mi brdeg pa dang  mtshung  brus kyang phyir mtshang mi 'dru ba dang  brdung ba dang  yang dang yang du brdung ba dang  bzod pa dang  bcings ba dang  gor ra bcug pa dang  btsog pa dang  smad pa dang  bsdigs pa dang  bcad pa rab tu  dam po dag la yang bdag nyid kyi nyes pa yin par sems shing / /
column16: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1881808#1881808#TD4054E.TXT.r_7396;TD4054E.TXT.r_7397# so sor dran pa tsam gyi sgo nas mdo la sogs pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi snang ba rnam par yongs su ma chad pa tshad med pa dang  gnas gyur pa'i snga rtags su gyur pa rnam par mi rtog pa mngon par 'du ma byas pa'i mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba'o // / +de gnyi ga'i phan yon ni chos kyi  sku shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa gnas gyur pas bsdus pa / /
column17: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#17522#17523#TD4036E.TXT.r_1319# de mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs gang dag la mig gtad par bya ba dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid  kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos gang dag la yid gtad par bya ba de dag la yang gtod par byed cing / /
column18: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#29624#29625#TD4036E.TXT.r_2409# rnyed pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang  tshul 'chos par mi bya zhing kha gsag dang  gzhog slongs dang  thob kyis 'jal ba dang  rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod par mi bya ba dang  rnyed pa de yang chags  pa med pa dang  zhen pa med pa dang  'chums pa med pa dang  mdud pa bor ba med pa dang  brgyal ba med pa dang  lhag par chags pa med pa dang  lhag par chags par gyur pa med pas yongs su longs spyad par bya'o snyam pa / /
column19: 0.023#TD4005E.TXT.r#993938#993938#TD4005E.TXT.r_542# byang chub ltung ba  bshags pa'i 'grel pa 'di byas pas // /

column21: 0.025#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1450076#1450076#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_5451;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_5452# skra'i rtse mo dang ri la sogs pa mthong ba ni mi mnyam ba la'o snyam du dgongs so // / +dbang po rdul phra rab rnams ji snyed pa zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ste / /
column22: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#346183#346184#TD4035E.TXT.r_10457# brda mi phrad pa'i tshig gang zhe na / /
column23: 0.028#TD4068E.TXT.r#1089406#1089406#TD4068E.TXT.r_4134# da ni slob ma rnams chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu dbye bas phan gdags par bya ba'i phyir khams bco brgyad nyid nas brtsams nas phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams kyi skabs su bshad pa'i chos rnams la gzugs can du / /
column24: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#2112982#2112982#TD4047E.TXT.r_6209# bsam gtan  dang snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i shes pa la sogs pa'i stobs la brten nas te / /

column3: de ltar mtha' gnyis bstan nas da ni dbu ma'i lam du 'jug pa bstan pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu dag 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34194#34204#TD4036E.TXT.r_2733;TD4036E.TXT.r_2734# bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas drug po 'di lta ste / / +bdag la sems pa dang  sems can la  sems pa dang  'jig rten pa la sems pa dang  sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la sems pa dang  bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul dang  sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sbyangs nas / /

column3: gzugs su snang ba'i rnam par rig pa yang mi dmigs pa de'i phyir 'di la sgro 'dogs par mi byed do zhes bya ba tshig gi rjes so // /

column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34228#34236#TD4036E.TXT.r_2734;TD4036E.TXT.r_2735# bdag la sems pa dang  sems can la  sems pa dang  'jig rten pa la sems pa dang  sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la sems pa dang  bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul dang  sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sbyangs nas / / +ji ltar thos pa'i chos de dag nyid rang gi  mtshan nyid dang  spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas sems par byed pa yin no // /

column3: 'di ltar rnam par rig pa thams cad kyi    thams cad du chud gson pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34267#34274#TD4036E.TXT.r_2737;TD4036E.TXT.r_2738# bgrang ba'i rnam pas chos rnams la bgrang ba'i tshul gyis sems par byed pa dang  gzhal BA'I RNAM PAS RIG PAS yon tan dang skyon nye bar brtag pa'i tshul gyis sems par byed  pa yin no // /

column3: gzhan du na mthong ba la sogs pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o // /

column3: rnam par rig pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang mi dmigs  zhes bya ba na 'dir rnam par rig pa'i sgra ni thams cad du 'khrul pa la dgongs te / /

column7: 0.015#TD4086E.TXT.r#2368693#2368694#TD4086E.TXT.r_3326# ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can gyi phyogs de dang de dag na ji ltar gser gyi seng ldeng yod pa bzhin du ri gzhan dag la med do // /

column13: 0.024#TD4068E.TXT.r#1046970#1046972#TD4068E.TXT.r_1400# nga rgyal thams cad kyang sems khengs pa'i mtshan nyid du tha mi dad du zin mod kyi nga rgyal gyis dmigs par bya ba'i yul tha dad pa'i sgo nas nga rgyal rnam pa bdun du  'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir / /

column17: 0.026#TD4042E.TXT.r#3058045#3058045#TD4042E.TXT.r_759;TD4042E.TXT.r_760# dman pa la phan yon smos pas gdul ba rnams gya nom pa la yang phan yon 'dzin du bcug par 'gyur pa dang  phan yon bcu po dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir dang  dge 'dun legs par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la  sogs pa gsal bar yongs su bstan pa phan yon de dag la 'jug par bslab pa'i phyir ro // / +gang gi tshe rnam par grol ba ni thams cad pas bla na med pa'i chos yin no / /
column18: 0.026#TD4061E.TXT.r#2790799#2790799#TD4061E.TXT.r_3743;TD4061E.TXT.r_3744# de la  bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dbang gis lus la sred pas sdug bsngal las rnam par mi grol ba'i phyir ro // / +de lta bas na de dag la gang zag med pa kho na bstan gyi chos med pa ni ma yin no // /
column19: 0.026#TD4006E.TXT.r#1973326#1973326#TD4006E.TXT.r_210;TD4006E.TXT.r_211# de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes su gyur pa / / +spyan du gyur pa / /

column22: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#1186458#1186458#TD4069E.TXT.r_5335# nag po dang  'dren ma dang  dkar po'i gnyen pos kyang yin te zhes bya ba ni las nag po'i gnyen po dang  las 'dren ma'i gnyen po dang  las dkar po'i gnyen pos kyang bslab pa gsum po dag go  rims bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin no // /

column27: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1205105#1205105#TD4069E.TXT.r_6758# mchod sbyin can gyi sdug bsngal gyis 'chi bar byed pa'am / /
column28: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#2121270#2121271#TD4047E.TXT.r_6904# gnod pa byed pa rnams la zhe sdang spangs nas byams pa dang  sdug bsngal can rnams la gnod sems bsal nas snying rje dang  yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la phrag dog spangs nas dga' ba'i sems bskyed pa dang  phan 'dogs pa rnams la    chags pa spangs nas btang snyoms kyi sems bskyed par bya'o // /
column29: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1138985#1138985#TD4069E.TXT.r_1714# bu med pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyid log pa na srog gcod pa la sogs pa la zhugs pa na che gzhan gyi las dang  de'i rkyen gyis sems can dmyal ba la sogs par 'grub bar 'gyur te / /
column30: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2942393#2942393#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4492# 'byung pa las gyur pa'i gzugs 'byung ba rnams kyi ni rnam par  smin pa'i rgyu kho na yin te / /

column18: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#1186458#1186458#TD4069E.TXT.r_5335# nag po dang  'dren ma dang  dkar po'i gnyen pos kyang yin te zhes bya ba ni las nag po'i gnyen po dang  las 'dren ma'i gnyen po dang  las dkar po'i gnyen pos kyang bslab pa gsum po dag go  rims bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin no // /

column20: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1525029#1525035#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11803;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11804# gang zhig gegs byed par mi nus pa rnams ni zhes bya ba la sogs  pa 'byung ngo // / +dper na chos thams cad skye ba la mya ngan las 'das pa dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / /

column23: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#2121270#2121271#TD4047E.TXT.r_6904# gnod pa byed pa rnams la zhe sdang spangs nas byams pa dang  sdug bsngal can rnams la gnod sems bsal nas snying rje dang  yon tan dang ldan pa rnams la phrag dog spangs nas dga' ba'i sems bskyed pa dang  phan 'dogs pa rnams la    chags pa spangs nas btang snyoms kyi sems bskyed par bya'o // /
column24: 0.028#TD4069E.TXT.r#1138985#1138985#TD4069E.TXT.r_1714# bu med pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyid log pa na srog gcod pa la sogs pa la zhugs pa na che gzhan gyi las dang  de'i rkyen gyis sems can dmyal ba la sogs par 'grub bar 'gyur te / /

column5: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#33527#33527#TD4036E.TXT.r_2670# yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang ldan pa dang  mi sdug pa dang  dbugs rngub pa dang  dbugs 'byung ba dang  bslab pa dang / /

column4: 0.0#TD4011E.TXT.r#641960#641960#TD4011E.TXT.r_526;TD4011E.TXT.r_527# dper na dge slong gzhan zhig gis mi tshangs par spyod pa dang  ma gsod pa'i phas pham pa gnyis byas te phyi nas de skyo ba skyes shing snying la gdung ba skyes par gyur te / / +smyon pa bzhin du gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang dang   grong nas grong dang  srang nas srang du rgyu zhing skye bo thams cad kyi mdun du bdag bcom mo // /

column17: 0.025#TD4011E.TXT.r#642042#642042#TD4011E.TXT.r_530# de  de ltar sems shin tu gdungs par gyur pa na mngon par shes pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gang gis chos zab mo de lta de lta bu bstan pas chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid du rtogs nas thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad nas sdig pa de thams cad drungs phyung nas mi skye ba'i  ches la bzod pa thob par gsungs pa bzhin no // /

column19: 1.192#TD4054E.TXT.r#1900700#1900702#TD4054E.TXT.r_8975# lha dang mir bcas pa zhes bya ba'i bar las 'gro bas na rnam par rab tu grol zhes pa'i bar du'o // /
column20: 1.192#TD4068E.TXT.r#1090818#1090820#TD4068E.TXT.r_4220# bco lnga dang tha ma gsum gyi cha'o zhes bya ba la mig gi dbang po nas lus kyi dbang po'i bar du dbang po lnga'i khams dang  gzugs nas reg bya'i bar du yul lnga'i  khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du rnam par shes pa lnga'i khams te / /
column21: 1.192#TD4080E.TXT.r#467#468#TD4080E.TXT.r_27;TD4080E.TXT.r_28# bden pa'i tshig smra ba dang  gzhan bsrung ba'i tshig smra ba dang  snyan pa'i tshig smra ba dang  sdig pa med pa'i  tshig dang  sems can thams cad la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu ster bar 'dod pa dang  gsod pa dang  'tshong ba dang  brdeg pa la sogs pa mi 'dod pa thams cad las sems can thams cad yongs su sgrol bar 'dod pa dang  dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las de'i 'bras  bu dag yod par yang dag par yid ches pa'o // / +de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bdud rtsi 'thung ba dang  'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang  sems can rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang  ji ltar nus pa bzhin du rab tu ster ba dang  sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun las ston pa gzhan  med par gus pas yang skyabs su 'gro ba sngon du song bas gus pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba la dngos po thams cad bdag nyid kyis rab tu 'jug pa dang  sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba can gyi byams pa dang  'chad par 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o // /
column22: 1.192#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2614844#2614845#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_5155# yang zhes bya ba'i sgra smos pa ni de lta bu dang mthun pa'i ldan pa ma yin pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: chos kyi dbyings de dang rnam par rig pa de gcig par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni thams cad la rnam     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34535#34546#TD4036E.TXT.r_2758;TD4036E.TXT.r_2759# de ni phung po rnams kyi skye ba'i ltos pa dang  gdags pa'i ltos pa zhes bya'o // / +skye ba'i ltos pa gang yin pa dang  gdags pa'i ltos pa gang yin pa de ni phung po skye ba dang  phung por gdags pa'i rigs pa dang  sbyor ba dang thabs yin pas na de'i  phyir ltos pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: des na thams cad kyis de kho na mthong bar 'gyur ba dang  chos kyi dbyings bzhin du rnam par rig pa yang bden par 'gyur ba dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin  pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba dang  rnam par rig pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings de yang 'dus byas dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa can la sogs pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /

column6: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34587#34600#TD4036E.TXT.r_2761;TD4036E.TXT.r_2762;TD4036E.TXT.r_2763# phung po rang gi rgyu dang  rang gi rkyen gyis bskyed pa gang yin pa rnams ni rang gi bya ba byed pa de dang de dag la sbyor bar byed pa yin te / / +'di lta ste / / +dper na mig gis gzugs rnams la lta bar byed pa dang  rna  bas sgra rnams nyan par byed pa dang  yid kyis chos rnams shes par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang  gzugs kyis mig gi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  sgras rna ba'i spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang  de bzhin du chos rnams kyis yid kyi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa'i bar     // /

'khrul pas sgro btags pa'i ngo bo yin pas gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad ni don dam par spang du med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34974#34984#TD4036E.TXT.r_2801# de ltar rnam pa gnyis po bgrang ba dang  grangs kyi rnam pa dang  rigs pas nye bar rtog pa'i rnam pa de  dag gis bstan pa de dang  de dag la yang dag par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sems pa yin te / /

column14: 0.026#TD4095E.TXT.r#126448#126448#TD4095E.TXT.r_1162# de 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dag gis thob na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bzhin du bdun dang brgyad kyis 'thob bo // /
column15: 0.027#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3124977#3124977#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3197;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3198# dge slong dag mtho ris ni 'dod pa / / +mtho ris ni sdug pa / /
column16: 0.027#TD4047E.TXT.r#2206988#2206988#TD4047E.TXT.r_13594# de ni sems kyi skad cig re re la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos thams cad khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no // /
column17: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#45060#45060#TD4036E.TXT.r_3727;TD4036E.TXT.r_3728# rnal 'byor ba de brtag par bya ba shes  bya'i dngos po'i rang bzhin de la yang dag par rtog par byed pa na / / +yon tan dang skyon nges par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni / /
column18: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#1141581#1141581#TD4069E.TXT.r_1909# dbang du byas pa nyid rnam grangs kyi mtshan nyid dang bcas pa yang  yongs su bstan pa yin te drang por gyur ba dang  las su rung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di gnyis dag go rims bzhin no // /

column20: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#2965605#2965605#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6383# bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag na ni btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug kho na yod kyi gzhan dag ni med do // /
column21: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#3007862#3007862#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_9843# bsam gtan dang bsam gtan las 'dod chags dang bral bar  byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam tha ma dgu pa de'i sems pa gang yin pa ste / /
column22: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#96530#96530#TD4036E.TXT.r_7905# gnyen po chung zad tsam dang ngan ngon tsam la brten cing cung zad brtsal ba tsam gyis sel nus par 'gyur ba dang  zhe sdang  bar 'gyur ba dang  gti mug par 'gyur ba dang  khengs par 'gyur ba dang  mthun pa dang  rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang  mthun pa'i yul rnams la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: bde blag tu zin par bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#35164#35178#TD4036E.TXT.r_2811;TD4036E.TXT.r_2812# chos gos dang  bsod snyoms dang  mal cha dang  stan dang  nad kyi gsos sman dang  yo byad dag dus dus su rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang  'dod chags shas che ba dang  'dod chags yun ring ba dang  zhe sdang shas che ba dang  zhe sdang  yun ring ba dang  gti mug shas che ba dang  gti mug yun ring bar 'gyur ba dang  des sngon nas mang bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas pas de'i rgyus nad mang ba dang  tshe 'di nyid la mi mthun par spyad pas de'i lus la yang dang yang du rlung dang  mkhris pa dang  bad kan 'khrug cing  gsung pa dang  zas la gdu ba dang  don mang ba dang  bya ba mang ba dang  tshogs 'du ba mang ba dang  las la dga' ba dang  smra ba la dga' ba dang  gnyid la dga' ba dang  bre mo'i gtam la dga' ba dang  'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang  bdag nyid kun tu  'dzin pa dang  mi brtan pa dang  bag med pa dang  yul ngan pa la gnas pa'am / /

column3: de la tshigs su bcad pa dang pos ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i rgyu'i dbyings su 'jug pa'i rgyu'i go rims bstan to // /

column3: gnyis pas ni de'i phan yon no // /

column3: dam chos 'di la rgyal ba'i sras // / +rnam par mi rtog bsams  gyur na // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#35200#35215#TD4036E.TXT.r_2815# yin pa la brten cing de la rjes su mthun pa'i gdams ngag dang  rjes su bstan pa dus dus su mi thob pa dang  yul ngan par nges shing de de na gnas pas nyin mo 'khrug long mang ba dang  mtshan mo skye bo mang po rtag tu sgra 'byin cing ca co mang la / /
column5: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2655509#2655509#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_7717# zhes  de tsam zhig brjod na ni dus tha dad las skyes pa rnams kyang dus tha dad pa las tha dad pa las skyes pa dag dang lhan cig mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyur thal ba 'gyur la / /

column5: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#34437#34439#TD4036E.TXT.r_2752;TD4036E.TXT.r_2753# ltos pa'i rigs pa dang  bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang  'thad pa  sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang  chos nyid kyi rigs pas so // /

column3: rab zhi zhes bya ba ni spros pa mtha' dag dang bral ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34488#34492#TD4036E.TXT.r_2756;TD4036E.TXT.r_2757# de la skye ba'i ltos pa ni rgyu gang dag dang  rkyen gang dag gis phung po rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'i  phung po'i skye ba de ni rgyu de dag dang  rkyen dang de dag las ltos pa yin no // / +ming gi chogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs gang dag gi phung po rnams gdags par 'gyur ba'i phung po gdags pa de ni ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs de dag  la ltos pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#35324#35336#TD4036E.TXT.r_2824;TD4036E.TXT.r_2825# bar chad gang dang phrad cing mngon sum du gyur na rnam pa thams cad  kyi thams cad du dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba'i mthu med cing mi nus pa yin no // /
column6: 0.002#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1760159#1760161#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10095# byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'gro ba'i skyabs su 'gyur bar yang ma zad kyi / /

column8: 0.002#TD4047E.TXT.r#2054513#2054515#TD4047E.TXT.r_1361# sems can thams cad kyi yon gnas su gyur pa DANG ZHES BYA BA NI 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa'i phyir dang  'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir dang  bla mar gyur pa dang  slob dpon dang  mkhan po dang  pha mar BRTAGS PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column11: 0.010#TD4054E.TXT.r#1897987#1897988#TD4054E.TXT.r_8744;TD4054E.TXT.r_8745# nyan thos rnams ni phung po rnams la rtag pa la sogs pa'i phyin ci log gi gnyen por ji lta ba  bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa la chos tsam du yongs su brtags nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa bdag med par rtogs te / / +de'i phyir de dag gi de ni phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa nyid ces brjod do // /

column5: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#2704269#2704269#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10830;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10831# de lta bas na reg pa'i dus na yod pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni tshor ba dang lhan  cig 'jug pa'i ma rig pa'i rkyen gyi ngo bor grub pas ma rig pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba YIN NO ZHES BYA BA 'DI bstan pa yin no // / +de lta bas na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir ma rig pa rgyu med pa nyid  kyang ma yin zhing de ltar reg pa'i dus na yod pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa tshor ba dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i ma rig pa'i rkyen gyi ngo bor grub pas bcu gnyis las ma gtogs pa'i yan lag gzhan gyis kha bskang bar yang mi bya'o // /
column6: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#2054641#2054641#TD4047E.TXT.r_1371# gnod pa med pa'i bsod nams  des bskyed pa'i bdag gi dngos pos gzhan gyi gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed nus par 'gyur ba nyid do // /

column3: mchog ces bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde bde dag las khyad du 'phags pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dbang byed ces bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang  ji srid  du 'dod pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro // /
